data.title: Red Kite, Blue Kite — Stark Library
data.meta_description: Red Kite, Blue Kite — Jiang, Ji-li — When Tai Shan and his father, Baba, are separated during China's Cultural Revolution, they are able to stay close by greeting one another every day with flying kites until Baba, like the kites, is free. Includes historical note.
data.text:
When Tai Shan and his father, Baba, are separated during China's Cultural Revolution, they are able to stay close by greeting one another every day with flying kites until Baba, like the kites, is free. Includes historical note.

There are no comments from the community on this title
